Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Our number of <clr:0000>bases<clr:ffff> in the Depths grows
by the day.

But we still don't have enough supplies!
What are you standing around for? Hurry
up and get to work!
Talk_05_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>From new recruit to blademaster faster
than anyone in Yiga history. Impressive.<sp:0:4:0>But don't expect any special treatment.
Master Kohga's the only special one
around here!
Talk_02: <sp:3:0:2:0700>You the new guy they're all talking about?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You've got a reputation for mastering the
<clr:0000>Earthwake technique<clr:ffff> faster than anybody
we've ever seen.
Keep it up. The more you use that power,
the greater Master Kohga's infamy grows.
Talk_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Our number of <clr:0000>bases<clr:ffff> in the Depths only
continues to increase.

We're still short on supplies of course,
so we'll be counting on you to help keep
everyone in line.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You've got a reputation for being the
chosen user of the <clr:0000>Lightning Helm<clr:ffff>.
Nobody else could handle that thing.
Wear it everywhere you go and show off
its power as much as you can to honor
our great Master Kohga!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You've got a reputation for being the
fastest recruit ever to <clr:0000>earn their place<clr:ffff>
in the Yiga Clan.
But that doesn't mean you get any special
treatment. Master Kohga's the only
special one around here!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If it isn't the new recruit I've heard so
much about...
Talk_06_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So the new blademaster everyone's 
talking about makes his appearance...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If it isn't the new recruit I've heard so
much about... The Depths squad might
have some use for you.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Rumors are swirling that Master Kohga
was defeated by Link. Impossible!<sp:0:4:0>Do not concern yourself with these lies,
but redouble your devotion.
Talk_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The way you carry yourself...<sp:5:1:0> You must be
the one I've heard all the stories about.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Depths are as good as ours!


And it's all thanks to Master Kohga
finding and surveying it before
anyone else!
Talk_07_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If it isn't the brand-new blademaster.<sp:5:1:0>
The Depths squad might have some
use for you.
